sentences.english: The figure is from a statue of the king standing in a boat throwing a harpoon.
sentences.chinese: 這件雕像雕刻的是古埃及法老站在一艘船上投擲魚叉。

sentences.english: We gigged for catfish off the pier.
sentences.chinese: 我們在碼頭以魚叉叉鮎魚。

sentences.english: When a boat got close enough to the whale, the harpooner threw his harpoon at it.
sentences.chinese: 等船非常接近鯨魚時，魚叉手就以魚叉向牠投射。

sentences.english: When a boat got close enough to the whale, the harpooner threw his harpoon at it.
sentences.chinese: 等船非常接近鯨魚時，魚叉手就以魚叉向牠投射。

sentences.english: Can you fill his hide with harpoons or his head with fish spears?
sentences.chinese: 你豈能以長矛穿透牠的皮，以魚叉刺透牠的頭顱？

sentences.english: We quickly picked up our javelins and spears and we ran at theJebusites.
sentences.chinese: 接着，我們迅速撿起標槍與魚叉，衝向更多的敵人。

sentences.english: He ordered his pilots to employ their harpoons and tow cables to ensnare the walkers' legs.
sentences.chinese: 他命令屬下的飛行員用魚叉和拖纜綁住步行機的長腿。

sentences.english: Spear phishing is targeting a particular organization.
sentences.chinese: 魚叉式網絡釣魚以特定的對象爲標靶。

sentences.english: The barbed tip of a harpoon.
The US also will supply 12 advanced Harpoon missiles, plus two mine-hunting ships。
sentences.chinese: 美方還提供了12枚“魚叉”反艦導彈和2艘獵雷艦。

sentences.english: Harpoon and Maces now correctly show the player's arm animation.
sentences.chinese: 魚叉和錘現在能夠正確的顯示玩家的手臂動畫。
這就是所謂“魚叉式釣魚”。

sentences.english: The US also will supply 12 advanced Harpoon  missiles, plus two mine-hunting ships。
sentences.chinese: 美方還提供了12枚“魚叉”反艦導彈和2艘獵雷艦。

sentences.english: When I pushed on the harpoon shaft the second time.
sentences.chinese: 那是在我第二次握着魚叉的柄扎進去的時候。

sentences.english: The hackers used a technique that is sometimes known as “executive spear phishing.”
sentences.chinese: 駭客使用通常被稱爲“高級魚叉式網路釣魚”的技術。

sentences.english: Suddenly his arm straightened, and the harpoon was thrown;
sentences.chinese: 忽然，他的胳膊使勁地一伸，魚叉投了出去。

definition: koinobori, a Japanese carp-shaped windsock flown to celebrate Children's Day
variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]
